history.proof: intros d sigma Href Hcorrect. unfold DTA_ref_ok, DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy. hauto lq: on use: dta_states_non_empty_lazy_eg_dta_states_non_empty, DTA_kill_ref_ok_invar unfold: DTA_kill_empty_states, DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy, DTA_ref_ok inv: DTA.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature Href : DTA_ref_ok (dta p a) Hcorrect : dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta p a) sigma Unable to unify "match DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty ?M1854) ?M1854 with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end" with "match match MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) a with | Some _ => dta (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) a | None => dta (M1 state 0%N (M0 prec_list)) 0%N end with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end".

In environment p : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature Href : DTA_ref_ok (dta p a) Hcorrect : dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta p a) sigma Unable to unify "DTA_ref_ok (dta p a)" with "match match MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) a with | Some _ => dta (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) a | None => dta (M1 state 0%N (M0 prec_list)) 0%N end with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end".

In environment p : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature Href : DTA_ref_ok (dta p a) Hcorrect : dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta p a) sigma Unable to unify "dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta p a) sigma" with "match match MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) a with | Some _ => dta (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) a | None => dta (M1 state 0%N (M0 prec_list)) 0%N end with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end".

original: intros d sigma Href Hcorrect. unfold DTA_ref_ok, DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy. destruct d as [p a]. simpl. apply DTA_kill_ref_ok_invar. - apply Href. - apply Hcorrect.
